welcome.title: Welcome to the Search Page
welcome.content: The search page allows you to query all information published in the BCH. To retrieve records of interest, you can use a combination of filters to narrow your search.

globalSearch.title: Global Search Filters
globalSearch.content: Global filters allow you to search the entire database through all record categories by selecting one or multiple options within the Record types, Keywords, Country, Regions and Date filters.

freeText.title: Free text search
freeText.content: This search box allows you to query the entire database using word(s) of your choice.

recordTypesFilterTab.title: Filter by Record Type
recordTypesFilterTab.content: Select one or more record types to search by specific category(ies) of records: National, Reference or SCBD.

keywordsFilterTab.title: Search by Keyword
keywordsFilterTab.content: Select one or more keyword(s) from the list. If you have already filtered by record type, the keyword filters displayed will be applicable specifically to that record type.

countryFilterTab.title: Search by Country
countryFilterTab.content:
Select one or more countries from the list.

Tip: Click on a letter to view all countries that start with that letter. You can also filter by countries that are 'Parties', 'Non-Parties' and 'Ratified, not yet Party'

regionFilterTab.title: Search by Region
regionFilterTab.content: Select from the pre-defined list of regions and/or regional groups.

dateFilterTab.title: Search by Date
dateFilterTab.content: Search for records published or created on a specific date or time period.

searchResults.title: Search Results
searchResults.content: To view search results, scroll down or click on the (x) button at the top right corner.

SearchResultsTab.title: Search Results: Tabs
SearchResultsTab.content:
Search results are displayed in separate tabs organized by record category. Click on a tab to view records associated with that category.
Note: The black circle indicates the total number of records in each category and will automatically change based on your search selections.

Tip: To view search results, scroll down or click on the (X) button at the top right corner.

SubFilters.title: Sub-filters
SubFilters.content:
Sub-filters appear when you select one or more record types within the Record types global filter.
They appear on the left-hand side and apply exclusively to the selected record type.
You can use sub-filters in combination

ViewingRecords.title: Search Results: Viewing Records
ViewingRecords.content: Once you locate the record of interest, click on it to view full details.

viewType.title: Search Results: View Type
viewType.content: Select the preferred display of results from the 'View Type' drop-down list.

sortBy.title: Search Results: Sorting
sortBy.content: Sort your search results by selecting one or more fields.

sendRecords.title: Search Results: Send
sendRecords.content: Click here to share your search results.

exportRecords.title: Search Results: Export
exportRecords.content: Click here to export the information to a spreadsheet format.
